meanings.definition: A person who is skilled in the art of planning and directing military operations.
meanings.sent1: The tacticians carefully mapped out the battlefield strategy.
meanings.sent2: The tacticians devised a plan to outsmart the enemy.
meanings.sent3: The tacticians joked that their battle plan was so good, even the pigeons would salute.
meanings.sent4: The tacticians' minds were like chess masters, always thinking several moves ahead.
meanings.sent5: The tacticians' expertise in military strategy was unmatched.

meanings.definition: A person who is adept at devising strategies or plans to achieve a specific goal.
meanings.sent1: The tacticians in the marketing department came up with a brilliant advertising campaign.
meanings.sent2: The business tacticians formulated a new approach to increase sales.
meanings.sent3: The tacticians at the board meeting brainstormed ideas that were out of this world.
meanings.sent4: The tacticians' plans were like a well-oiled machine, smoothly achieving their objectives.
meanings.sent5: The tacticians' ability to strategize led to great success in their projects.
